quotes.raw_quote_text: It tops the list of birthdays. I don’t think words can describe that feeling, seeing the fans, it is everything you’ve dreamed of, coming true. It means everything.
quotes.summary: This is the best birthday ever, seeing the fans makes all my dreams come true.

quotes.speaker: Lewis Craig
quotes.raw_quote_text: He was quick and very strong for his size. He always had aggression and he was one of the kids who played on the edge... he was always respectful.
quotes.summary: He was strong, aggressive, and played with an edge, but remained respectful.

quotes.speaker: Lewis Craig
quotes.raw_quote_text: I didn’t think he scored poachers goals... but he worked on it religiously. He always worked on stuff and he was in training early, even as a kid.
quotes.summary: I didn't see him as a poacher, but he dedicated himself to training to improve.

quotes.speaker: Mike Hargreaves
quotes.raw_quote_text: He’s dropped deeper now, but when he played up front for Burnley he'd score over 100 goals each season and I’m not even exaggerating.
quotes.summary: Playing forward at Burnley, he scored over 100 goals every season.

quotes.speaker: Mike Hargreaves
quotes.raw_quote_text: His real stand-out qualities were he was hard-working, aggressive, he put himself about and he was a really exciting dribbler.
quotes.summary: He was known for being hardworking, aggressive, and an exciting dribbler.

quotes.speaker: Lewis Craig
quotes.raw_quote_text: You can tell what Manchester United means to him when he plays... he was outstanding, doing the horrible side of the game really well.
quotes.summary: His passion for Manchester United shows in his outstanding play.

quotes.speaker: Craig
quotes.raw_quote_text: You’re around top players every day at United and you either adapt or die.
quotes.summary: You have to adapt quickly to thrive among top players at United.

quotes.speaker: Mike Hargreaves
quotes.raw_quote_text: I genuinely think he embodies what a United player should be, bringing excitement, being hard-working and holding himself in the right way.
quotes.summary: He truly represents what a United player should be: exciting and hardworking.

article_metadata.article_headline: Once a Manchester City academy player, Jeremie Frimpong would have been in with a chance of thriving under Ruben Amorim at Man United had a deal been struck earlier this year.

quotes.speaker: Jeremie Frimpong
quotes.raw_quote_text: [When reflecting on the contract situation at Manchester City] I thought, 'Yeah, I clearly don't have a future here,' so I’ve got to take a different step.
quotes.summary: I realized I had no future at City and needed to move on.

article_metadata.article_headline: Goncalo Gregorio exclusive: 'I played under Ruben Amorim at Casa Pia and Braga and couldn’t stop scoring… everybody loved him’

quotes.speaker: Goncalo Gregorio
quotes.raw_quote_text: I looked across and the player next to me was crying. Then I looked around the room and others were in tears. Ruben tried hiding it by looking over his shoulder but he was emotional.
quotes.summary: I saw my teammate crying and Ruben was emotional too.

quotes.speaker: Goncalo Gregorio
quotes.raw_quote_text: The captain and those with more power were trying to get him to stay. I remember my teammates saying, 'You should stay with us and battle. We are on this ship together.'
quotes.summary: My teammates urged Ruben to stay with us.

quotes.speaker: Goncalo Gregorio
quotes.raw_quote_text: Honestly, we were playing great and the atmosphere was so good but we couldn't change his final decision. He was upset with numerous things. We had to respect it.
quotes.summary: We were in good spirits, but we couldn't change his decision.

quotes.speaker: Goncalo Gregorio
quotes.raw_quote_text: He was really demanding. Ruben wanted the best conditions for us to prepare; whether that was organising ice baths or doing more gym work to prevent injuries.
quotes.summary: Ruben demanded the best conditions for our training.

quotes.speaker: Goncalo Gregorio
quotes.raw_quote_text: Ruben had money to do it but there are a lot of people who have money and wouldn't do such a thing… It sums him up as a man.
quotes.summary: Ruben's actions reflect his character.

quotes.speaker: Goncalo Gregorio
quotes.raw_quote_text: I just felt really confident playing under him. His passion to work every day with a smile is infectious.
quotes.summary: I gained confidence and was inspired by his passion.

quotes.speaker: Goncalo Gregorio
quotes.raw_quote_text: If I'm being honest, all of the team, but the main example was me. I went from scoring five goals in the previous season to scoring 25 goals in a few months.
quotes.summary: Everyone improved, but I had the biggest leap in goals.

quotes.speaker: Goncalo Gregorio
quotes.raw_quote_text: Everything will be different under Ruben. Right now, United are fragile. They aren't in a good way but he has the power and authority to change everything.
quotes.summary: Ruben will transform Manchester United's current state.

quotes.speaker: Goncalo Gregorio
quotes.raw_quote_text: This is one of the best things about Ruben. He'll clear everything in their minds. It's a new life for them.
quotes.summary: Ruben will refresh the mindset of the players.

quotes.speaker: Goncalo Gregorio
quotes.raw_quote_text: I will definitely be watching that game. It'll be midnight here in Armenia but I'll try and stay up. He will win, for sure.
quotes.summary: I'll stay up late to watch his first game and I believe he will win.

article_metadata.article_headline: Liverpool fans convinced Mo Salah has dropped major hint on his future with cryptic Instagram message

quotes.speaker: Mo Salah
quotes.raw_quote_text: (Speaking about his last year at the club) I had a good summer and had a long time to myself to try to stay positive because, as you know, it's my last year at the club. I just want to enjoy it and I don't want to think about it. I feel like I'm free to play football, and then we'll see what happens next year. I was coming to the game today thinking it could be the last time. Nobody at the club has spoken to me yet about a new contract, so I just play this last season and then see at the end of the season.
quotes.summary: I'm staying positive in my last year and focusing on enjoying football.

article_metadata.article_headline: Schooled like Mourinho: Amorim’s path from pioneering Lisbon university

quotes.speaker: Prof António Veloso
quotes.raw_quote_text: I interviewed him for the course and from the start it was obvious. The students needed to do an essay on specialist topics and Ruben’s results were fantastic. He had a leadership role in the group.
quotes.summary: I recognized Ruben's talent from the beginning and he excelled in his studies.

quotes.speaker: Prof António Veloso
quotes.raw_quote_text: José was always mentioning that he studied here and naming our faculty as his alma mater. If we were designing a finance course, we would definitely use someone in that sector of his level to help us. So I called him and said: ‘I think we have a unique opportunity to develop a programme based on your knowledge of football, linked with your academic background. You’re in a unique position, having a scientific view of your profession.’
quotes.summary: I proposed the idea to José of creating a football program based on his expertise and academic experience.

quotes.speaker: Prof António Veloso
quotes.raw_quote_text: You need to have both worlds together, with experienced people working at a high level.
quotes.summary: We should integrate academia and real-world experience in football.

quotes.speaker: Prof António Veloso
quotes.raw_quote_text: The starting point of the revolution was the link between academia and the Portuguese federation.
quotes.summary: The connection between academia and the federation initiated a transformation.

quotes.speaker: Prof António Veloso
quotes.raw_quote_text: José opened the door for Portuguese coaches, but it was more like a gate than a door. And Ronaldo opened a door for players.
quotes.summary: José created opportunities for coaches, and Ronaldo did the same for players.

article_metadata.article_headline: Bruno Fernandes sparks Manchester United to easy victory over Leicester

quotes.speaker: Bruno Fernandes
quotes.raw_quote_text: It was a long time that I wasn’t scoring and now goals are coming in the last few games.
quotes.summary: I've struggled to score, but now I'm finding the net again.

quotes.speaker: Bruno Fernandes
quotes.raw_quote_text: [Speaking about Garnacho's goal] Garnacho scored a banger but didn’t celebrate like he should because he thinks he has lost faith from some fans. I told him: ‘People will always moan but lots of people like you and enjoy what you do.’
quotes.summary: I encouraged Garnacho, telling him that many fans appreciate his efforts despite the criticism.

article_metadata.article_headline: Ruud van Nistelrooy admits future desire to manage Manchester United

quotes.speaker: Ruud van Nistelrooy
quotes.raw_quote_text: Of course. I thought this through well when I made the decision to come to Manchester United as an assistant manager or assistant coach. I thought that through and I knew that coming to Manchester United was for me a special occasion where I felt I wanted to be part of this journey with the club in also an assistant role. I had clear ambitions to manage, I made the decision to sign a two-year deal as an assistant and I’m still in that frame of mind to be fair, to stay in that capacity.
quotes.summary: I considered my decision to be an assistant at United carefully because I want to manage here in the future.

quotes.speaker: Ruud van Nistelrooy
quotes.raw_quote_text: When you want to be a successful side in the Premier League and in Europe, you’re going to need a certain amount of goals. That’s why the best teams in the world have those players. At the moment we have players who get a certain amount of goals or assists but obviously they are in an age when they have to be developed, and there’s potential that they will be, and the belief is they can. In this moment that’s where we are.
quotes.summary: To succeed in the Premier League and Europe, you need to score goals, and while our players are developing, I believe they can improve.
